rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a coat check area and reception built-in storage solutions.
An open-plan living space adjacent to the kitchen; designed for natural ventilation, with large windows following Vastu principles ensuring sunlight and fresh air.
Integrated into the living area, featuring eco-friendly appliances, energy-efficient lighting, and a design that minimizes heat gain with proper shading.
A private bedroom designed for tranquility; includes built-in storage and large windows in the east direction to enhance morning light as per Vastu.
Well-equipped bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural ventilation openings.

openings.description: Main entry door ensuring smooth transition while maintaining privacy.
Large windows to enhance natural light, following Vastu principles for east exposure.
Separate door ensuring privacy with a view of the garden or external greenery.

additional_features.description: An integrated gym space designed for personal fitness routines with soundproofing and natural ventilation. Located on the ground floor to maximize accessibility.
Design elements incorporate irregular plot geometry; flexible room boundaries, strategic placement of openings to optimize sunlight and maintain privacy as per local building norms.
